p: Indeed, chemical profiling allows the differentiation of many chemotypes, each of them being dominated by one terpene, like piperotenone oxide, carvone, piperitone epoxide, menthone, pulegone, piperitone, trans-dihydrocarvone, isomenthone, menthofuran, menthol, 1,8-cineole, isopiperitenone, piperitenone and borneol [ 86, 137, 138, 139, 140, 141, 142].
